Development teams as appropriate Worked with Product Owners to understand requirement identify and refine user stories and tasks Worked with the development teams to ensure that the product vision is reliability performance and availability of our LMS application Few mentions Developing POC to replace exiting Glassfish DB connection pooler with HikariCP Developing POC to use Redis for sharing session in our clustered web application Architecting asynchronous approach using ActiveMQ to improve reliability of some of jobs Working with developers to improve rending of our web application by
